data: Contraindications:  Severe allergy to components of vaccine including polyethylene glycol (PEG)  Active COVID-19 infection or presence of symptoms suggestive of COVID-19
Refer to BCCDC guidelines for most up to date information
0.3 mL, IM, as directed, order duration: 1 doses or times, first dose: NOW
0.3 mL, IM, as directed, order duration: 1 doses or times
0.5 mL, IM, as directed, order duration: 1 doses or times, first dose: NOW
0.5 mL, IM, as directed, order duration: 1 doses or times
Observe for anaphylaxis for 15 minutes post administration of vaccine. If signs of anaphylaxis
0.5 mg, IM, q5min, PRN anaphylaxis, drug form: inj
